document.masterDocTitle: The genus Sphecodes Latreille 1804 (Hymenoptera: Apoidea: Halictidae) in Central Asia

subSubSection.paragraph:

(nom. praeocc., nec Erichson 1835 ): 9, replacement name for
Sphecodes rufipes Sichel 1865
.

General distribution. Central ASia ( UzbekiStan , * KyrgyzStan , TurkmeniStan , TajikiStan ); Europe (north to 64°), RuSSia (eaSt to Far EaSt), North Africa, CaucaSuS, Turkey , PakiStan , Mongolia .
